completed_steps.summary: Loaded documentation requirements for 11 project types
Classified as monolith infra project with 1 part: Docker Compose media stack with 27+ services across 5 compose files
Found 10 existing docs in docs/: SETUP.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, REFERENCE.md, UPGRADING.md, BACKUP.md, HOME-ASSISTANT.md, TROUBLESHOOTING.md, LEGAL.md + root README.md, CONTRIBUTING.md
Tech stack analyzed: Docker Compose multi-file, Traefik v3, Gluetun v3.41, Pi-hole, Tailscale, 27+ services with specific versions
Deep scan complete: read all 5 compose files, scripts/pre-commit (11 checks), scripts/backup-volumes.sh, all existing docs. Deployment config analyzed.
Source tree documented: annotated directory tree with all critical folders, entry points, network and storage architecture
Development and deployment info extracted from CONTRIBUTING.md, scripts, compose files
Architecture document written: architecture-technical.md covering dependency graph, IP allocation, inter-service comms, volumes, health checks, security, testing, deployment
Supporting docs written: project-overview.md, source-tree-analysis.md, development-guide.md, deployment-guide.md
Master index.md generated linking all generated and existing docs
Workflow complete. 6 documents generated, all validated.

findings.project_classification: Monolith infra project, Docker Compose multi-file architecture, 27+ containers

resume_instructions: Workflow complete. All documents generated and validated.
